text:
Vaidehi (30), a traffic constable attached to Tirupur North police, was attacked by unidentified persons while on duty along Kumaran Road on Friday evening. Police sources said that she sustained head injuries in the attack. The Tirupur North police have registered a case.

Three arrested

The Madathukulam police on Friday arrested three persons on charges of abducting K. Marimuthu, a realtor, and robbing him of his car, two mobile phones, credit card and cash.

Eleven people were involved in the abduction that happened two weeks ago, police sources said.

Marimuthu was reportedly beaten up by the gang, before it fled in his car. - Staff Reporter
title: Traffic constable attacked
